entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
